message.content:
1. The treatment lasted for 8 weeks.
2. There were changes in sitDBP/systolic BP (SBP) after the treatment.
3. The changes in sitDBP/SBP were −9.67±6.50/−12.89±11.78 mmHg in the CKD-828 2.5/40 mg group.
4. The changes in sitDBP/SBP were −10.72±6.19/−13.79±9.41 mmHg in the CKD-828 2.5/80 mg group.
5. The changes in sitDBP/SBP were −4.93±7.26/−4.55±11.27 mmHg in the S-amlodipine 2.5 mg group.
6. The BP reductions in the CKD-828 2.5/40 mg group were significant (P<0.0001/P<0.0001).
7. The BP reductions in the CKD-828 2.5/80 mg group were significant (P<0.0001/P<0.0001).
8. The BP reductions in the S-amlodipine 2.5 mg group were significant (P<0.0001/P=0.0027).

messages.content:
Statement: After the 8-week treatment, changes in sitDBP/systolic BP (SBP) were −9.67±6.50/−12.89±11.78, −10.72±6.19/−13.79±9.41, and −4.93±7.26/−4.55±11.27 mmHg in the CKD-828 2.5/40 mg (P<0.0001/P<0.0001), CKD-828 2.5/80 mg (P<0.0001/P<0.0001), and S-amlodipine 2.5 mg (P<0.0001/P=0.0027) groups, respectively, which were all significant BP reductions.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
